On the [2nd day afternoon](/forum/day2.html), there will be technical visits to some mobility companies that operate in Potugal.

<br/>

## <img style="height: calc(1.29rem + 0.48vw)" src="https://www.infraestruturasdeportugal.pt/themes/ip_corporativo_theme/images/logo-cor.png"/>

::: {.alert .alert-info}
{{< fa address-card >}} All participants enrolled in the visit to Infraestruturas de Portugal must take an ID card or passport with them.
:::

Infraestruturas de Portugal is the public company responsible for managing the Portuguese road and rail infrastructure.
<br/><br/>
In this visit, the participants will have the opportunity to get to know the Lisbon rail operational control center, managing most of the national infrastructure.
<br/><br/>
**Schedule**: 15:00 to 17:00 | 
**Openings**: 25 participants | 
**Location**:  [Lisbon Operational Control Center](https://maps.app.goo.gl/obNwnZEdKZKweUhc8){target="_blank"}

## <img style="height: calc(1.29rem + 0.48vw)" src="https://www.gira-bicicletasdelisboa.pt/wp-content/themes/gira/resources/assets/images/logo_gira.svg"/>

GIRA is Lisbon's public bike system. Operating since 2017, it already counts with 188 dock stations, that provide more than 2000 bicycles to live and explore the city.
<br/><br/>
The visit will allow the participants to explore the system control center and the bicycles workshop.
<br/><br/>
**Schedule**: 15:00 to 17:00 | 
**Openings**: 25 participants |
**Location**:  [GIRA bike workshop](https://maps.app.goo.gl/5Q3qK19mVz1KQtsP9){target="_blank"}

## <img style="height: calc(1.29rem + 0.48vw)" src="https://www.tmlmobilidade.pt/wp-content/themes/tml-theme/assets/images/logo.svg"/>

<!-- Based on https://www.emta.com/network/lisbon/ -->

TML is a public company 100% owned by the Lisbon Metropolitan Area (AML), a public association of 18 municipalities. It works as a transport authority with the main functions of ticketing manager for all modes under the brand Navegante, and bus service provider by subcontracting under Carris Metropolitana. It also has competences in the development, management, and operation of parking and mobility services. TML also studies, plans and implements mobility solutions.
<br/><br/>
In this visit, the participants will have the opportunity to get to know TML headquarters and visit the Carris Metropolitana operational control center.
<br/><br/>
**Schedule**: 15:00 to 17:00 | 
**Openings**: 25 participants |
**Location**:  [TML headquarters](https://maps.app.goo.gl/qHzuPBuDL9s1BGGH6){target="_blank"}
